profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on business analysis, requirements interpretation, solution design, risk identification, quality oversight, financial validation, innovation identification, and technology planning. There are no mentions of specific AI/ML tasks, model development, prompt engineering, RAG, or even the integration of AI/ML into software. The tasks described fall under general business analysis and strategic planning, not within the scope of Core Software Engineering (Macro-Category A) or GenAI Specialization (Macro-Category B) as defined in the coding book. Therefore, the role is classified as 'Not Relevant'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear in its description of responsibilities.
